encyclopedia.content: Jeremiah[.dʒeri'maiə] 中文拼写：杰里迈亚 名字含义：耶和华至高无上 名字来源：希伯来语 使用Jeremiah英文的名人 Jeremiah 耶利米： 《圣经》中人物，公元前七和六世纪时希伯来先知。

means.word_mean: 1. (Old Testament) an Israelite prophet who is remembered for his angry lamentations (jeremiads) about the wickedness of his people (circa 626-587 BC)
2. a book in the Old Testament containing the oracles of the prophet Jeremiah
